amendment.description: To authorize and improve Operation Hero Miles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3236 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3236 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S6433-6435; text: CR S6434) To authorize and improve Operation Hero Miles.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3236 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Talent.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3236 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
